intro: Trixostis, commonly known as the small-flowered trixostis, is a member of the Asteraceae family. It is a flowering plant that typically grows in moist, temperate regions. The plant features narrow, grass-like leaves and produces small, daisy-like flowers with yellow centers and white petals. It is often found in meadows and along streambanks. Trixostis is valued for its ornamental appeal and ecological role in supporting pollinators.
